tiers.title: Tier 1
tiers.description: Transportation limited to walking, scooters, bikes and public transport. Accommodation must be basic, with the lowest-rated hotels and access to only vending machine food, instant ramen noodles and free samples

tiers.title: Tier 2
tiers.description: Accomadation must be basic with amenities, with meals primarily from convenience stores (コンビニ) such as 7/11

tiers.title: Tier 3
tiers.description: Access to higher-tier transportation options like Ubers, taxis, or car rentals. Accommodations upgrade to 5-star hotels, and access to all restaurants

challenges.title: Purchase a new outfit of chat's choice to wear all day
Find the mysterious old man and ask about his life story
Purchase 10 Onigiris and sell them for profit (+300 points per sale, 3000 total)
Do not say "bro / dude / hell / fuck" all day. Balance starts at +5000 points. -500 points from the 5k balance every fail, past that starts deducting from actual points
Ice Vs Joel round 2 - Sushi Challenge. +1000 points for each plate you eat. -500 points for each plate Joel eats.
Explore the JDM car scene in Daikoku
Lock in a 2nd date with maya for today or in the coming days. Make reservations to confirm.
Take a gamble. Play a best of 5 game of rock paper scissors with a stranger. If you win, stay at the four seasons for 1 night. If you lose, -6000 points.
Make someone random kick streamer. Buy them all the gears and stuff.
Have orgy with kang and other japanese dudes and girls
